backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, shared tasks with photos, access control, and legacy decision types with migration hook.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old task and actor data to the new shared-task model while dropping obsolete overtime fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing updated frontend files, components, and test IDs for overtime removal and task redesign features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend components, hooks, and pages reflecting task redesign and removed overtime features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, role setup, profile onboarding, and rendering the app shell.
frontend/src/components/auth/FirstManage: Dialog prompting initial managers to confirm role setup and triggering backend role assignment.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Displays a login screen with branding, prompting users to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Exports a list of avatar metadata and a helper to resolve an avatar image path by ID.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Provides a paginated grid UI for selecting an avatar from the avatar manifest.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Defines the static list of badge IDs, translation keys, and icons.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Shows all badges in a sheet, highlighting which ones the user has earned.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the main header with branding, user menu, settings, badges, theme toggle, and language selector.
Wraps the main app layout with header, tabs, page routing, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Dropdown control for switching the app’s active language.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button to toggle between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Displays a table listing completed tasks with user info, comments, and photo indicators.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Generates a bar chart summarizing number of completed tasks per user.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Renders a dropdown for selecting a user by principal, showing avatars and usernames. Calls back with the chosen Principal or null.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Displays a horizontal tab bar and triggers tab changes when buttons are clicked. Highlights the active tab.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: Form for entering overtime minutes, date, and comments with validation. Submission is disabled because backend overtime functionality is unavailable.
Shows a sorted list of overtime entries with date, minutes, and visual indicators for additions or subtractions. Displays a placeholder when no entries exist.
Calculates total overtime minutes and converts them into workdays plus remaining minutes. Displays totals in styled info cards.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Provides data export and local profile deletion options using a sheet UI. Clears cached data and logs out on delete.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal shown on first use to collect username, initials, and avatar before saving a new user profile. Determines role based on current user’s authz status.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Settings panel allowing profile edits and avatar changes, with access to a privacy submenu. Saves updates to the caller’s user profile.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for completing a task with optional comment and before/after photos, submitting data via useCompleteTask.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog for creating a task with title and type selection, submitting via useCreateTask.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Displays task details, status, badges, and allows marking tasks as complete through a dialog.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Sorts and lists tasks by completion and priority, rendering each with TaskCard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to fetch caller's user role and admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Computes earned badges based on overtime entries and completed tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns the i18n context for localization, requiring use within I18nProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, and stored identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Empty placeholder file for manager overtime hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Provides a hook to export task data using the actor, disabled by default.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Wrapper around toast notifications with localized success, error, and auto-mapped error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Legacy overtime hooks returning empty data or errors since overtime was removed from backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal placeholder noting queries are split into feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, creating, completing, and resetting tasks using the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Contains hooks to fetch and update user profiles via the actor, including current user, specific user, and all profiles.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context with language persistence and a translation lookup function.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and nested translation dictionaries for UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Provides tabbed navigation for manager-specific overtime and statistics pages.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Allows managers to select users and view overtime sections, with CSV export disabled due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Displays task statistics and audit log and supports CSV export of task data via the actor.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history, handling loading state via React Query.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows task list, triggers recurring task resets on mount, and provides task creation UI.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports arrays of objects to downloadable CSV files with proper escaping.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for the FitGebit Team Tracker update.
